item.title: By: Martin G
item.dc:creator: Martin G
item.description:
I by CDs for similar reasons (plus, it's going to have to take a pretty serious magnetic field to erase a CD...)
I read Stross's piece, he makes a few good points. And I can recommend the e-book, I've got the paper one and it's worth the investment
item.content:encoded:
I by CDs for similar reasons (plus, it’s going to have to take a pretty serious magnetic field to erase a CD…)

I read Stross’s piece, he makes a few good points. And I can recommend the e-book, I’ve got the paper one and it’s worth the investment
